Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: Well, out of all of them, the nutjob seems the least likely to have a date.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: I mean, how hard will it be to convince her? With my beauty this will be a cinch.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: I start walking to her. It looks like she's too busy posing and monologuing about 'A new world!' to notice me.

Name: Cursor-Kun
Story: After waving my hair in front of her face (I got no hands after all), she finally looks up at me with a smirk.

Name: Ares-Sama
Story: 'Who are you, puny mortal!? To talk to me is akin to dancing with death itself!'
